PERAZHAGAN JAYARAMAN                      jp_azhagan@yahoo.com | 201-258-9141
Atlanta, Georgia 30022.    
                                                                                                                             
SUMMARY 
 
•Dedicated and accomplished Lead Infrastructure with decades of extensive in architecting, designing, and 
managing enterprise storage solutions. Demonstrated expertise in improving storage infrastructure quality, 
availability, and productivity through automation, process improvement, and ITIL methodologies. Adept at 
managing incident resolution, leading cross-functional teams, and integrating storage solutions across multiple 
sites and geographic areas.
•Proven expertise in migration projects, integrating with Cloud technologies and architecture storage 
environments such as Dell EMC PMAX/VMAX/VPLUX/SC/Isilon/IBM DS/HPE/Pure Arrays, NetApp,  
Nutanix and IBM Spectrum Protect, Commvault, Veeam, Zerto, Avamar, Dell DPS, Cohesity (Saas) and

environments such as Dell EMC PMAX/VMAX/VPLUX/SC/Isilon/IBM DS/HPE/Pure Arrays, NetApp,  
Nutanix and IBM Spectrum Protect, Commvault, Veeam, Zerto, Avamar, Dell DPS, Cohesity (Saas) and 
Rubrik Cluster. Adept at implementing Cloud Storage (AWS/Azure/GCP) services, Data Domain, DLm for 
Mainframe and various Storage including All Flash models and Data-Protection technologies.
•Proven track records in enhancing  BCP/DR/RTO/RPO, Data security and legal retention.
•Handled Vulnerability remediation, ransomware fix snaps, replications, primary, secondary and third copy 
solutions.

Enterprise Storage Management

EXPERIENCE 
 
Innova Solutions                                                                                                                                 Nov 2014 – Till date
Role:  Backup-Storage Lead Engineer
Client: Mercedes-Benz USA, Atlanta, GA
Description: 
•Lead a team of storage and backup engineers in designing, implementing, and maintaining enterprise-level 
storage and backup solutions, ensuring high availability, scalability, and performance. 
•Implemented disaster recovery (DR) strategies and protocols to minimize downtime and ensure business 
continuity in the event of system failures or disasters. 
•Conducted regular performance tuning and optimization of storage systems to improve efficiency and reduce 
costs, resulting in enhanced system reliability and reduced storage footprint. 
•Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define and document storage and backup requirements, develop

costs, resulting in enhanced system reliability and reduced storage footprint. 
•Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define and document storage and backup requirements, develop 
solution architectures, and implement best practices for data protection and retention. 
•Evaluated emerging storage and backup technologies, conducted proof-of-concept testing, and made 
recommendations for technology adoption to improve operational efficiency and reduce risks. 
•Provided technical leadership and mentorship to team members, fostering a culture of continuous learning and 
professional development.
•Enhanced enterprise storage infrastructure quality and availability through automation.
•Improved storage engineering team productivity and execution by deploying ITIL common processes, 
interfaces, tools, and automation.
•Led engineering efforts for large-scale, complex, multi-gigabyte data center storage solutions, including

interfaces, tools, and automation.
•Led engineering efforts for large-scale, complex, multi-gigabyte data center storage solutions, including 
integration with cloud provider solutions and on-premises infrastructure. Implemented SAN switch technology
management, storage provisioning, Volume group/LDEV/LUN creating, mapping/Map view, SRDF, RDF and 
Metro replication, snap, Flash and CU Mainframe split and for HP,Hitachi & IBM storage -Supported storage 
provisioning, zoning , Flash copy, Volume copy, Remote Mirroring, SNAP,  and synchronize/a synchronize 
replication.
•Managed and maintained data storage solutions utilizing IBM DS8K, EMC PowerMax, HPE, Unity arrays, 
Pure, InfiniDat, EMC Isilon, Data Domain, NetApp, Nutainix NAS, and SAN fabric infrastructure.
•Implemented SAN switch technology management, storage provisioning, LUN masking, zoning, performance 
management, and  FC/NFS/SMB/CKD volume management.

•Implemented SAN switch technology management, storage provisioning, LUN masking, zoning, performance 
management, and  FC/NFS/SMB/CKD volume management.
•Operated key storage solution products from multiple vendors, including PowerPath, Oneview, Unisphere, 
SRDF, Recover Point, VPLEX, Storage Resource Manager (SRM), IBM Spectrum, and InfiniMetrics.
•Contributed to storage cyber ransomware solutions and integration initiatives.
Enterprises Backup and Archive:
•Architecture, migration, Installation, Configure and day to day operation of Enterprise Backup & Recovery 
appliance/software includes network connection, installation and create policy, schedule and ad-hoc backup, 
one-to-one, one-to-many, many-to-one replication, integrating with multi cloud storage,  instance and 
applications.
•Managed North America Mercedes-Benz entity hosted/housed backup appliances and software includes IBM

applications.
•Managed North America Mercedes-Benz entity hosted/housed backup appliances and software includes IBM 
Spectrum protect (TSM), Commvault, Veeam, Zerto,Dell DPS, Avamar, Networker, Rubrik-RSC, Cohesity, 
Netbackup/flex and cloud (AWS/GCP/Azure) backup & (SaaS) storage.
Migrations, Cloud and others:
•PM in CMO to FMO migrations, more involved on network/VLAN/Firewall and decommission process.
•Led Backup server and NAS migrations and Zerto cloud manager integration with Cloud platform.
•Integration / migrating application to Docker/Kubernetes container technologies and providing 
FSx/RSC/Cohesity storage (SaaS) with Cloud platform AWS/Azure/GCP and IBM Cloud.
•Experience in GitHub, Bitbucket, AWS CodeCommit, CI/CD (AWS CodePipeline, Jenkins, Maven, AWS 
CodeBuild), Terraform, Salesforce,Puppet, Ansible, and Splunk.
•Writing and debugging Shell scripts/Powershell/Html/Python to automate and monitoring.

CodeBuild), Terraform, Salesforce,Puppet, Ansible, and Splunk.
